intro.title: Book Introduction
intro.description: This book is designed to provide a comprehensive understanding of Physical AI, with a special focus on humanoid robotics. Whether you're a student, researcher, or enthusiast, you'll find foundational concepts and advanced topics to deepen your knowledge.

part1-foundations/chapter1-what-is-physi.title: What Is Physical AI?
part1-foundations/chapter1-what-is-physi.description: Understand the definition and motivation behind Physical AI, and recognize why humanoid robots require intelligence aligned with the physical world.

part1-foundations/chapter2-robotics-foun.title: Robotics Foundations
part1-foundations/chapter2-robotics-foun.description: Understand how physical systems perceive and act, and establish the mental model needed for later modules.

part2-ros2/chapter3-ros2-architecture.title: ROS 2 Architecture
part2-ros2/chapter3-ros2-architecture.description: Understand ROS 2â€™s communication model and recognize ROS 2 as the nervous system of a robot.

part2-ros2/chapter4-robot-models-urdf.title: Robot Models & URDF
part2-ros2/chapter4-robot-models-urdf.description: Ability to interpret a robot model and prepare for simulation and Isaac integration.

part3-digital-twin/chapter5-simulation-f.title: Simulation Fundamentals
part3-digital-twin/chapter5-simulation-f.description: Understand the role of physics-based simulation and know how sensors are digitally represented.

part3-digital-twin/chapter6-building-int.title: Building Interactive Environments
part3-digital-twin/chapter6-building-int.description: Understand scene design for humanoid tasks and prepare for later VLA demonstrations.

part4-isaac/chapter7-isaac-sim.title: Isaac Sim
part4-isaac/chapter7-isaac-sim.description: Understand how Isaac Sim is used for photorealistic rendering, domain randomization, and synthetic data generation.

part4-isaac/chapter8-isaac-ros-navigatio.title: Isaac ROS & Navigation
part4-isaac/chapter8-isaac-ros-navigatio.description: Learn how Isaac ROS modules, including VSLAM and Nav2, contribute to robot mapping, localization, and navigation.

part5-vla/chapter10-capstone-pipeline-ov.title: Capstone Pipeline Overview
part5-vla/chapter10-capstone-pipeline-ov.description: Gain a high-level understanding of a complete VLA pipeline, from voice input to robot manipulation.

part5-vla/chapter9-vla-systems-overview.title: VLA Systems Overview
part5-vla/chapter9-vla-systems-overview.description: Understand the foundational concepts of Vision-Language-Action (VLA) systems and their role in connecting AI to robot actions.

part6-hardware/chapter11-hardware-overvi.title: Hardware Overview
part6-hardware/chapter11-hardware-overvi.description: An introduction to the types of hardware that support Physical AI workflows, including workstations, Jetson kits, and various sensors.

part7-conclusion/chapter12-review-next-s.title: Review & Next Steps
part7-conclusion/chapter12-review-next-s.description: Review the book's content and be directed towards further learning and hands-on implementation.
